header.name: chaos/preprocessor/seq/rest_n.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that yields the remainder of a after removing a user-specified number of elements.

macro.abstract: The macro removes the number of elements specified by its first argument from the head of its second argument.
